resources.string: Melodic hardcore legends, Hopesfall is an American post-hardcore band from Charlotte, North Carolina formed in 1998. They have produced four albums over twenty years, with a fifth album being released this year.
Electronic music masters, Little Dragon was formed in Gothenburg, Sweden in 1996. They have released five studio albums and multiple remix and compilation albums.
Formed in Washington D.C in 2007, Animals as Leaders is a highly influential band in the Djent scene. They have released four studio albums.
